name: Sampler
tagline: Visualizing EMF models has never been so cool.
body:
### Welcome to SAMPLER Page.
Here you will find some information about the SAMPLER tool and its progress. You can read the basic information abut how install and run the plug-in, find some examples, and check the new features of SAMPLER.

Enjoy SAMPLER, and visualize models!


### Building web site...

## Update Site
You can download and install SAMPLER usint this link to the [Update Site](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Rioukay/sampler/master/sampler.update.site/site.xml)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
